isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Opening Scuff Plate and Seat Belt Retractor Cover on Daycab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 72
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door opening scuff plate (Item 2) on cab floor and install four torx head screws (Item 1), passenger side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Install push-in fastener (Item 3) securing seat belt retractor cover (Item 4) to seat belt retractor assembly (Item 5), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to install driver side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover.

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Opening Scuff Plate and Seat Belt Retractor Cover on Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 73
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door opening scuff plate (Item 2) on cab floor and install four torx head screws (Item 1), passenger side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Install push-in fastener (Item 3) securing seat belt retractor cover (Item 4) to seat belt retractor assembly (Item 5), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to install driver side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover.
